CustomField.description: Do not manually update. Updated by automatic processes. See excluded Record Types in Household Settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: CRM: Overall Number of (hard-credit) gifts made by this Account. See "Combined Total Number of Gifts" for overall number of gifts (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. FC: Overall number of grants awarded to grantee. NPSP Customizable Rollup.
CustomField.label: Total Number of Gifts
